text:
Disney Channel's
gonna make you...

- ( screaming )
- ...with a special

- sneak peek-- 
- Sneak peek!

- make that sneak shriek... 
- Sneak shriek!

...of "Zombies:
The Re-Animated Series."

So wait, did A-Spen
use alien technology

to mess with time and space
and somehow reset senior year?
Yes! But also, no.

I'd explain it, but it only
makes sense in alien.

Then it's probably best not
to think about it ever again.

I'm with Zed.
I'm just happy we get

to spend another year
having fun together.
With new friends.

- And old.
- ( music playing )
♪ I'm so excited ♪

♪ We're repeating
our senior year ♪

♪ It's gonna be amazing,
everybody is here ♪

♪ And this time's even better,
now I know who I am ♪
♪ Who loves a good redo? ♪

- ♪ We do! ♪
- ♪ Let's go! ♪
♪ This is my jam ♪
♪ We're all together right now ♪

♪ Let's turn it up
and get loud ♪

♪ Feel the beat,
move your feet ♪

- ♪ Senior year is on repeat ♪
- ♪ Repeat! ♪
♪ We're all together right now ♪

♪ Let's turn it up
and get loud ♪

♪ Feel the beat,
move your feet ♪

- ♪ Senior year is on repeat ♪
- ♪ Repeat! ♪

♪ This'll be the best
senior year so far ♪

♪ Got accepted into college,
got a real sweet car ♪

♪ The girl of my dreams
by my side again ♪

♪ Time to just chill
with my very best friend ♪

♪ We gotta catch up
on the Seabrook changes ♪

♪ And all the tea, and still
push myself academically ♪

♪ But you and I will make
new memories ♪

- ♪ With a few new friends ♪
- ♪ And a lot more me ♪
♪ We're all together right now ♪

♪ Let's turn it up
and get loud ♪

♪ Feel the beat,
move your feet ♪

- ♪ Senior year is on repeat ♪
- ♪ Repeat! ♪
♪ We're all together right now ♪

♪ Let's turn it up
and get loud ♪

♪ Feel the beat,
move your feet ♪

- ♪ Senior year is on repeat ♪
- ♪ Repeat! ♪

♪ Feel the beat,
move your feet ♪

- ♪ Senior year is on repeat ♪
- ♪ Repeat! ♪

So it turns out
that koala fingerprints

are indistinguishable
from human fingerprints!

Wait, so does that mean the
koala drove the getaway car?
Oh, they're checking his alibi.

If it wasn't called true crime,
who'd believe it?

- Am I right?
- Oh! Cornbread's on the menu.

If we're gonna wash
that down,

we're gonna need a couple
of ice cold sodas, please.

Ah-ah-ah! No.
See, soda is unhealthy
and terrible for young minds.

So from now on, we'll only be
serving Sans Saveur.

Grapefruit-hinted
sparkling water.

Bleh!
This stuff has no taste.
It tastes like the memory

of a grapefruit
I ate five years ago.

Principle Lee, this
garbage water is an insult
to fizzy beverages everywhere!
Oh, stop being so dramatic.

I'm just doing what's best for
the well-being of my students.
I get absolutely nothing

out of this lucrative
brand partnership.
Absolutely nothing!
Ugh! This stuff is so gross.

Even the blob won't touch it
and he consumes everything.

We still need
a new physics teacher.
What are we gonna do-- oh!

That's your
"I've got an idea" face.

Tell me, tell me,
tell me, tell me!
What if, and bear with me,
I invented a new drink,

a soda alternative
that's flavorful, healthy,

- and deliciously irresistible.
- ( music playing )

♪ Are you already sick
of this flavorless swill? ♪

♪ Do your taste buds
cry in dismay? ♪

- ♪ They do! ♪
- ♪ This Sans Saveur ♪
♪ Is an affront to our school ♪
♪ But I'm here to save the day ♪

- Whoo-hoo!
- ♪ Imagine if you can ♪

♪ One beverage so delicious
and nutritious ♪
♪ It'll change your lives ♪

♪ Everybody's mood will improve
with a sip or two ♪

♪ Chugging down a fizzy nectar
worthy of a Nobel prize ♪

- ♪ Do you want the bubbles? ♪
- ♪ Oh, yeah! ♪

- ♪ Do you want the taste? ♪
- ♪ Oh, yeah! ♪

♪ If you're ready for a can
of Zed's miracle soda ♪

♪ Let me hear a big cheer,
sip, sip ♪

- ♪ Hurray! ♪
- ♪ Zed's got the soda ♪

- ♪ Your palate's saved ♪
- ♪ Zed's got the soda ♪

- ♪ The critics rave ♪
- ♪ Zed's got the soda ♪

- ♪ You'll smile for days ♪
- ♪ Zed's got the soda ♪
♪ And I shall name it ♪

- Zoda!
- ( cheering )
Yeah! Whoo! You're a hero!

Yeah.
I'm gonna save the school,

and I know exactly
how I'm gonna do it.

And I need you to tell me
exactly how to do it.

You seriously want to take
a stand for soda?

The cause of cavities, disease,
and the crippling cycle

of sugar addiction that
serves to profit companies

who knowingly exploit
our natural weaknesses?
Yes?
No?

Come on!
Eliza, do it for me,

your best friend since
we were little zomblings.

I can't believe you're pulling
the best friend card again.

- Ugh, fine!
- If they didn't work,

I wouldn't have printed
so many.
Ye-he-ah! Whoo!
Too flat.

- ( explosion )
- Addison: Too bubbly!

Eureka! Not too flat,
not too bubbly.
May I present, zoda.

Things with chunks
can taste good.
I can't.

But-- but, hey,
maybe instead of me tasting it,

I can cheer you on
while you taste it.
Go, Zed!

Mmm, that texture is--
( retches )
...is exciting and new.
Ugh, why'd we make so much?

There's no way anyone's
gonna drink this stuff.

( chugging )
Ah!
Whew! What?

I know an elite athlete
power shake when I see one.
Tastes like feet and burnt hair,
so it's got to be real healthy.
Whoo! Hardcore!

You know, there's
a saying in the field,

a great inventor
never gives up.

And you are not a great
inventor, so please give up.

Fine. I'd pour this failure
sludge down the drain,
but I think it eats metal.

If only an irresistible
sparkling beverage recipe

could somehow just
fall out of the sky.
Aah! Thanks!

"Totally Rad Curses
of the 1990s."
Oh. Never mind!
Oh, snap! My bad.
I was aiming for the trash.

Clearing out stock
from my curse shop.

The '90s nostalgic phase
was a smaller window

- than I expected.
- There's a curse shop here?
Just opened. Come on in!

Oh, uh, that's okay.
I'm not really--

( deep voice )
I said come on in!

Yeah, yeah, yeah,
I'll come right in.

So what is this stuff exactly?
Is it, like, magic?
Pssh! "Magic isn't real,

and therefore,
results cannot be guaranteed."

At least that's what
my lawyers tell me to say.

Anyway, found what
you're looking for.

One recipe for an irresistible
sparkling drink.
But, like, beware!

This recipe is, like,
totally cursed!
Oh, no!

Wait, so how cursed
are we talking here?

Uh, like, maybe 30%.
About the same as coffee.
I can work with that.
( gasps )

It's flavorful and sparkling
and delicious!

I've finally made
the perfect soda! Aah!
( evil laughter )
It's probably fine.

- Extra, extra! Zoda!
- Huh?
Get your irresistible zoda!

- Ahh!
- Mmm!

- Okay. That's pretty good.
- What is going on h--
Oh! Oh, my that is good.
Give me ten bottles now.
Wow, everyone loves zoda.

And, hey, there's only
one bottle left.

- ( crowd shouting )
- Aah!

I'm so proud of you, Zed.
You really pulled it off.

You made an absolutely
irresistible drink.

- ( grunting )
- Boyfriend can't breathe.

Boyfriend can't breathe.
Please let go.

Oh, I'll let go
when you give me more zoda!

( cackling )
Yeah!

- All sold out.
- ( all moaning )

- Zoda.
- We want more Zoda now.

- ( moaning )
- Did that cursed recipe

turn everyone
into zoda-crazed zombies?

I mean, 'cause that would be
super ironic.

- Aah!
- ( moaning )
Aah!
( gasps )
( snarling )
( gasps, shouting )

- Heh, heh, heh.
- Zoda!

- Zoda!
- ( panting )
Ah, thank goodness, Eliza.
Need zoda.

Eliza:
This is so embarrassing.
And yet, zoda!
Whew. Aah!
Yoohoo! Zed? Hello?

Bucky? You're not a--
your eyes aren't purple.

No, they are a lovely shade
of butternut caramel.

- Zoda!
- Aah!
What is happening right now?
Seriously? You don't know?

Okay, my zoda
turned everyone at school

- into zoda-zombies.
- ( rasping )
Huh, that's kind of ironic

since soda created zombies
in the first place.

And you zombie-ing out
to stop the zombies?

- Bucky, help me!
- Bonzo: Zoda.

- ( powering down )
- Whew.

I am so glad someone else
around here isn't a zo--

wait, we both drank the zoda.
Why aren't either of us zombies?

- The zoda-kind.
- How should I know?

The only reason I was looking
for you was to see

if you had any more
of that health smoothie.

It did wonders
for my complexion.

Health smoothie?
You mean my failure sludge?

Hang on. We're the only
two people who drank it.
The sludge must be the antidote

to the zoda-zombification
effects.
( glass breaking )

- Zoda!
- Aah!
Zoda!
Aah!
Zed, zoda me!

Yo! We need that!
To stay alive!

I just wanted a few chunks.
Aah!

- Aah!
- Zoda.

Aim for the heads!
Well, you know. The mouths.
( all groaning )

- That was weird.
- Zed!
I knew this was a bad idea.

And don't you dare
try to smooth things over

by pulling another
best friend card.

What? Come on.
Eliza, I would never!

Oops, looks like
I dropped something.

You know one day,
this isn't gonna work.

- Of course it won't.
- Zed.

After seeing the great
lengths you went to
in order to replace Sans Saveur,

I've realized that
the student body simply,
well, they don't like it.

- And so--
- You're bringing soda back?

Oh, no, no, no, no.
Adorable, no.

I'm replacing it
with Petite Goût,
which has four times the flavor

of that garbage water
Sans Saveur.
That's right.
0.0004% fruit flavor.

It tastes like a ghost
of a baby grapefruit
has taken a nap in my mouth.

- I like it!
- I call this a victory.

Wonderful, I am so glad
I could do something

- purely for your enjoyment...
- ( beeping )

...and for no other
reason at all.

- She's the worst, right?
- Oh, yeah.

Announcer: And that's just
a taste of what's coming.

Want more?
Then come back to Seabrook

for "Zombies:
The Re-Animated Series."
